title: It say ''reconnect to the game'' while i know 100% the game is over
body: i dont know why and how but everytime when i try to login my account im in this reconnect to a running game screen and i cant get to the main page of Legue pls help me with that :)

replies.body: These are the german boards, you have to talk about Weißwurst and Sauerkraut here. {{champion:79}}
